SCANDURATION_DEFAULT - Static variable in class com.blukii.infosdk.DiscoverySettings
Scan duration of one discovery phase: 5000 milliseconds.
SCANMODE_BALANCED - Static variable in class com.blukii.infosdk.DiscoverySettings
Scan mode with balanced power consumption and scan frequency: ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_BALANCED.
SCANMODE_LOWLATENCY - Static variable in class com.blukii.infosdk.DiscoverySettings
Scan mode with high power consumption and scan frequency: ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY.
SCANMODE_LOWPOWER - Static variable in class com.blukii.infosdk.DiscoverySettings
Scan mode with low power consumption and scan frequency: ScanSettings.SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER.
SCANWAITDURATION_DEFAULT - Static variable in class com.blukii.infosdk.DiscoverySettings
Scan wait duration wait duration between two discovery phases: 15000 milliseconds.
